author: A_Brickset_user
title: A good value pack
review: I think value packs stand out more if they contain sets unlike those in the theme they're part of.  This one is a good example, because of the robot and the battering ram.  You won't find anything like these small sets in the SP2 or Black Knights themes.  The gun cart does have two pirates but doesn't seem all that special otherwise.  The airplane is negligible and the windsurfer unnoticeable.  The sets that aren't Town make it worth buying.

author: hustla187
title: Jumping across Lego
review: This is an awesome Bonus Pack. You get Space Police, Pirates, town, and Dragon Knights all mixed together. If you need an army builder for Pirates and Dragon Knights, this is the set to get. A 5 out of 5 for a great job mixing the right themes.
